title: Year of the Woman 2.0
description:
The 2018 midterms will go down in history for many reasons. Of them will be the record number of women running for office. David Meyers speaks to Bloomberg's Arit John on the Year of the Woman 2.0 and its impact on the midterm elections. 
FOLLOW UP
 Arit's latest report: It May Be the Year of the Woman, But Not for Female GOP Candidates
You can follow Arit at: @aritbenie
----
 TicToc is a daily news podcast hosted by David Meyers (@davidfmeyers), produced at Bloomberg Worldwide HQ in New York City. You can follow up with us and watch our reporting @tictoc. If you like it, be sure to rate us on iTunes, and tell your friends!
